name: Deglet Nour Dates
description: Deglet Nour is known as the 'date of light' because of its golden translucent colour. It has a firm flesh and a delicate, sweet flavour.
characteristics: Golden translucent colour, firm flesh, delicate sweet flavour

packaging.naturalClaim: 100% NATURAL - No added Sugars, No Preservatives, No Additives

terroir.geography: North African Sahara Desert oases in Tunisia and Algeria
terroir.climate: Hot, dry desert climate with cool winter nights - ideal for concentrating natural sugars
terroir.soil: Sandy soil with excellent drainage, palm roots reach deep aquifers for consistent water supply
terroir.whySpecial: Deglet Nour means 'Date of Light' in Arabic - named for its translucent, golden-amber color when held to light. The desert terroir creates perfect balance of sweetness and firmness.

originStory: Deglet Nour, meaning 'Date of Light' in Arabic, comes from the sun-drenched oases of Tunisia and Algeria. The hot desert days and cool winter nights create perfect conditions for these semi-soft dates with their signature translucent, golden-amber color. The sandy soil and deep aquifers give Deglet Nour its delicate sweetness and firm texture that makes it ideal for baking and cooking.
tastingNotes: Delicate honey sweetness, semi-soft texture, subtle nutty notes, not as intensely sweet as Medjoul - perfect for those who prefer balanced sweetness
bestUse: Baking, cooking, chopping into salads, everyday snacking - the firm texture holds shape in recipes
whyWeCare: North African terroir creates the perfect balance of sweetness and firmness. Customer quote: 'Best for baking, consistent quality' - rated 4.3/5 for reliability.
